languages.text: "Может, уже прекратишь оскорблять человеческий род при каждом удобном случае?"
"Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"
languages.original_text: "Может, уже прекратишь оскорблять человеческий род при каждом удобном случае?"

traits.locale_text: "Can you stop insulting the humankind at every possible turn?"
"Can you stop insulting the humankind at every possible turn?"
"Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"
"Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"
"Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

languages.text: “你能不能别再一有机会就侮辱人类？”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

traits.locale_text: “你能不能别再一有机会就侮辱人类？”

languages.text: «A lo mejor podrías probar a dejar de insultar nuestra especie a la mínima de cambio».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor podrías probar a dejar de insultar nuestra especie a la mínima de cambio».

languages.text: « Vous pourriez peut-être cesser d'insulter la race humaine à la moindre occasion ? »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez peut-être cesser d'insulter la race humaine à la moindre occasion ? »

languages.text: "Vielleicht solltet Ihr aufhören, die Menschen bei jeder Gelegenheit zu beleidigen?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht solltet Ihr aufhören, die Menschen bei jeder Gelegenheit zu beleidigen?"

languages.text: 「ことあるごとに人類を侮辱するのはやめてくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

traits.locale_text: 「ことあるごとに人類を侮辱するのはやめてくれないか？」

languages.text: "Belki artık her fırsatta insan ırkını aşağılamayı bırakırsın."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps you would stop insulting the human race at every turn?"

traits.locale_text: "Belki her fırsatta insan ırkını aşağılamayı bırakırsın, ha?"
